title: Self-Directed Receptive Language Proficiency Development Program Using an Integrated Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language structure and grammar
context.additional_context: Limited-technology environments enabling supplementary material use via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can extract core information with 80% accuracy by analyzing various text types (academic/practical).
Learners can interpret pragmatic context (intent, emotion) in listening situations with 75% accuracy.
Learners can apply three or more interlingual interaction strategies through integrated tasks (listening + reading).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
